newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU says clears BA takeover of Air Liberte.
newsitem.headline: EU says clears BA takeover of Air Liberte.

text.p: The European Commission said on Friday it had cleared British Airways Plc's proposed acquisition of insolvent French airline Air Liberte.
BA already owns French carrier TAT. Air Liberte went into receivership in September. Both operate mainly in the French market out of the coveted Paris Orly airport.

"The Commission has examined the effects of the operation as concerns routes and in particular on the Paris-Toulouse route on which British Airways/TAT and Air Liberte both operate," it said in a statement.
"The Commission has come to the conclusion that the operation...does not create a dominant position," it added.
A Commission spokesman had told Reuters earlier this week that the deal would be approved.
